refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the IP address of the calling client.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function is used to determine the IP address or DNS name of the calling client.
Please note that this function is slow when resolving a DNS names. It is advisable to use IP addresses to to make applications faster.

refsect2.title: what
refsect2.para: a flag designating what to return:

simplelist.member: 1 - DNS name if it can be resolved; if no reverse DNS record can be found then the IP number will be returned.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: By default, a string of the dotted IP address of the client user agent. If what=1 then the DNS name will be returned.
